wikipedia_page.main: John Mackie Wren (26 April 1936 – 13 August 2020) was a Scottish footballer who played for Hibernian, Rotherham United, Stirling Albion and Berwick Rangers. He later emigrated to South Africa and played for Hellenic F.C. and Cape Town City.

response: *Jackie Wren, 84, Scottish footballer (Hibernian).Jackie Wren: His Memory Marches On

* 13 August 2020: Jackie Wren, 84, Rotherham United goalkeeper.
